# xpc_int64_get_value(_:)

**Function**

Returns the underlying signed 64-bit integer value from an object.

## Declaration

```swift
func xpc_int64_get_value(_ xint: xpc_object_t) -> Int64
```

## Parameters

- **xint**: The signed integer object which is to be examined.

## Return Value

The underlying signed 64-bit value.

## Number objects

- **xpc_double_create(_:)**: Creates an XPC double object.
- **xpc_double_get_value(_:)**: Returns the underlying double-precision floating point value from an object.
- **xpc_int64_create(_:)**: Creates an XPC signed integer object.
- **xpc_uint64_create(_:)**: Creates an XPC unsigned integer object.
- **xpc_uint64_get_value(_:)**: Returns the underlying unsigned 64-bit integer value from an object.
